attributes.action: Tax non-British road vehicles by selling a display sticker as they come into the country in the same way as the Swiss do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay a lot of tolls to use French roads, but it is a pleasure to use them, i.e. all the lovely places to stop. Tolls are paid in Italy, roads not so good. Tolls are also paid in most country's on the continent. Stickers are bought to use the roads in Switzerland, we in Britain should do the same as this would be very easy to manage, and we should use a lot of the money to increase the pleasure of our driving, and probably by the amount of vehicles that come into the country, and possibly do not even buy fuel, reduce our road tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
